tool_description: An API with more than 10.000 hentai videos from Pornhub,  make it easy to create your own adult website.
name: hentai-hub
title: hentai-hub

api_list.name: video
api_list.description:
Get the videos.

The iframe url must be: 

https://www.pornhub.com/embed/ + video_id

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number query must be defined, the default page number is 1

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The limit query must be defined, the default limit is 10 and max 50.
